name: Super Huber
description:
Super Huber is my entry for Ludum Dare #40. The theme was "the more you have, the worse it is".

Tidy the objects in groups without touching the other objects. Making a mistake causes all of the previously collected objects and some junk items to be blown out into the room. Be careful!

"Super Huber LD40" are the versions entered into Ludum Dare #40.

"Super Huber" are the versions finished and uploaded after the competition to replace the sound effects and music tracks.
